column4: Hi people. Stupid question. Can I mount an ftp share with the "mount" utility?
thanks, do you remember the syntax?
I'm experiencing very weird things when mounting it from the GUI
folders change name if start with numbers and hide their content
GUI = Desktop application "Connect to a server"
and I was wondering that if I mount it from command line I might have a better result
you should do everything from the command line
indeed, that's my opinion too, but since I don't remember now the syntax I gave a try to the GUI
